```{r}
questions_df <- NA_questions_list %>% 
  ldply(
    .,
    data.frame
  )
  
colnames(questions_df) <- c('Topic', 'Question')
```

```{r}
sample_question <- function(df, N = 1, topic = NULL) {
  
  total_n <- nrow(questions_df)
  sub_df <- sample(1:total_n, N)
  df[c(sub_df),]
  
}
```

```{r}
sample_question(questions_df, N = 5)
```
